name: Retention (itch)
description:
Welcome to Retention! My first game ever! In this game you are a woman who woke up with no memories and you want to know where you are, why you are here, and who you are. Explore your way through the town, talk to the people you meet, and inspect the things around you! There is a big secret for you to discover about yourself, but it may come at a cost.. Overall, I hope you enjoy it.

Currently this game is in Alpha, so I want feedback and opinions, the final version with all of the polishes I am developing will be out soon.
